entry.title: Current Conditions: 12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 08:00 AM ADT Saturday 28 May 2016
Temperature: 12.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 11.5°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle. High 17 except 13 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 17 except 13 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 6.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 28 May 2016
